SEARCH
Module com.example.dinnerreserver
Package com.example.dinnerreserver.model

Interface IRestaurantDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockRestaurantDAO, SqliteRestaurantDAO
public interface IRestaurantDAO
Interface for the Restaurant Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the User class with the database
